constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 98 (Wednesday, June 8, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. WATERS:
H.R. 7978.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with he
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H5409]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

title: Promoting and Advancing Communities of Color Through Inclusive Lending Act
